sub_title: Ph.D. candidate at Universidad Andrés Bello

home.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Astrophysics at Universidad Andrés Bello, Chile. Currently I'm working under the supervision of Timo Anguita (UNAB) and Manuel Aravena (UDP) in dusty star-forming galaxies al high redshift from the SPT-SMG sample, studying their interstellar medium. I got my B.Sc. in Astronomy (2014) degree at Universidad Andrés Bello, Chile.

fields.text: Thesis Project: Studies of the Interstellar Medium in Distant, Gravitationally Lensed Star Forming Galaxies
Project: Analysing MUSE data of SPT2349-56
